template.name: class
template.content:
package ${class.packageName}; import java.util.*; <#if class.umlRelation??> <#if class.umlRelation.composes?? && (class.umlRelation.composes?size>0)> <#list class.umlRelation.composes as c> <#if c.composeClass?? > import ${c.composeClass.packageName}.${c.composeClass.name}; </#if> <#if c.composeInterface?? > import ${c.composeInterface.packageName}.${c.composeInterface.name}; </#if> <#if c.composeEnum??> import ${c.composeEnum.packageName}.${c.composeEnum.name}; </#if> </#list> </#if> </#if>
<#if class.attributes?? && (class.attributes?size>0)> <#list class.attributes as attr> <#if attr.otherType??> <#if attr.otherTypePackageName?? && attr.otherTypePackageName != "" && attr.otherTypePackageName != class.packageName> import ${attr.otherTypePackageName}.${attr.otherType} </#if> </#if> </#list> </#if> <#if class.operations?? && (class.operations?size>0)> <#list class.operations as opr> <#if opr.paramterOut??> <#if opr.paramterOut.otherType??> <#if opr.paramterOut.otherTypePackageName?? && opr.paramterOut.otherTypePackageName != "" && opr.paramterOut.otherTypePackageName != class.packageName> import ${opr.paramterOut.otherTypePackageName}.${opr.paramterOut.otherType}; </#if> </#if> </#if> <#if opr.paramterIn?? && (opr.paramterIn?size>0)> <#list opr.paramterIn as p> <#if p.otherType??> <#if p.otherTypePackageName?? && p.otherTypePackageName != "" && p.otherTypePackageName != class.packageName> import ${p.otherTypePackageName}.${p.otherType}; </#if> </#if> </#list> </#if> </#list> </#if> ${class.visibility} class <#if (class.finalSpecialization)> final</#if> <#if (class.virtual)>abstract</#if> ${class.name} <#if class.umlRelation??> <#if class.umlRelation.parentClass??> extends ${class.umlRelation.parentClass.name}</#if> <#if class.umlRelation.impInterfaces?? && (class.umlRelation.impInterfaces?size>0)> implements <#assign insertImps><#list class.umlRelation.impInterfaces as imp>${imp.name},</#list></#assign> ${insertImps?substring(0, insertImps?last_index_of(","))}</#if></#if> { <#if class.attributes?? && (class.attributes?size>0)> <#list class.attributes as attr> ${attr.visibility} <#if attr.statics>static </#if><#if attr.readOnly>final </#if> <#if attr.javaType??> <#if attr.list> List<${attr.javaType.realType}> <#else> <#if attr.arraySize == 0> ${attr.javaType.realType} <#else> ${attr.javaType.realType}[] </#if> </#if> <#else> <#if attr.list> List<${attr.otherType}> <#else> <#if attr.arraySize == 0> ${attr.otherType} <#else> ${attr.otherType}[] </#if> </#if> </#if> ${attr.name} <#if attr.defaultValue??> = <#if attr.defaultValue.valueType == 'String'> "${attr.defaultValue.value}" <#else> ${attr.defaultValue.value} </#if> </#if> ; </#list> </#if> }
